resources.string:
Hello! I am Aritra Roy.
 Currently, I am pursuing the IIT Madras Online Degree course in Programming and Data Science, along with B.E. in Civil Engineering at BMSCE, Bangalore (currently studying in the 4th semester). 
 I am planning to graduate with both the B.E.(Civil Engineering) from BMSCE and B.Sc. degree from IIT Madras by 2024. 
 I have bought the GfG DSA self-paced course and the Comprehensive Android Development Course by Paulo Dichone from Udemy recently to master DSA and problem solving in JAVA as well as Android-Development.
